description: Central Provincial Council - Order to remove Chairman of the Director Board of Central Province Passenger Transport Services Authority Mr, E.P. Weerawardene w.e.f. 25.09.2017. Order to appoint officer as a member of the Director Board / Chairman of the Director Board of Central Province Passenger Transport Services Authority Mr, C.R. Mendis Pujapitiya w.e.f. 25.09.2017.
